content: If a CA car registration sticker went to the address, you should probably update your address first! But check if there are any DMV Now Kiosks near you. You can request replacement registration/stickers there and it will spit them out immediately after you pay the small replace fee. A lot of DMV's have them, too, so you can just walk in and tell them you just want to use the kiosk, and you won't need an appointment or have to wait in line.
